alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 6:14AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northeast Johnson County and Southeast Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most snow should fall before 9 am. Visibility will drop to around one quarter mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
